recipesJson.name: Boosted Remix #REMIXMONTH
recipesJson.author: MrColdOne
recipesJson.description: Here's my attempt at a Boosted remix. This is a recipe I've been chasing for atleast 3 years now and while it's still not exact, I do feel this is the closest recipe out to the original. After going out and getting a few bottles I actually feel they may have changed the formula, I remember the original being really buttery and creamy. But non the less it's still a great recipe.

This is easily one of the best strawberry profiles on ATF!
i used butterscotch ripple as i didnt have original and  loved it

wonderful textured strawberry cream vape! its on my regular rotation now. perfectly sweet and i would change nothing about the recipe. nonoff flavors. steeped 2 weeks - its not too good as a shake and vape, really needs some time. only sub was FW VBIC at the same %. this is in my top three strawberry recipes of all time! keep up the good work!
